data.text: an amplifying or explanatory word, phrase, or sentence inserted in a passage from which it is usually set off by punctuation
examples: The speaker inserted some often amusing parentheses during his speech.
The parenthesis of war interrupted the course of his life.
The plant's common name is followed by its Latin name in parentheses.

data.text: a remark or passage that departs from the theme of a discourse: digression
examples: The speaker inserted some often amusing parentheses during his speech.
The parenthesis of war interrupted the course of his life.
The plant's common name is followed by its Latin name in parentheses.
